content.p: The Faculty of Social Sciences is one of the largest and most diverse in Europe, with seven different schools with teaching and research varying across a wide range of topics, theories and methods of analysis. We have a long history dating back to 1798, and since then they have grown in depth and breadth to include a wide range of subject areas and academic disciplines. Find out more about the Faculty of Social Sciences at Nottingham. Study with us Research Schools lz-foss-core-ops@exmail.nottingham.ac.uk Current student enquiries
